title: Mango-Moves
description: A dog inspired browser game that I developed just one week after learning Javascript. My dog, Mango, loves to go to the beach. The user must take her there. To get there, Mango needs to avoid obstacles and score points. The game ends if Mango runs into an obstacle. To win and reach the beach, Mango needs to get 250 points.

title: Football Fan Experience
description: A full stack MERN application. This application is geared toward NFL fans. Fans will be able to fill out stadium review forms and view previous reviews on all/any NFL stadium.

title: Strength
technologies: React | Express | Node | Mongoose | Tailwind CSS
description: Strength is an app for those who enjoy weight lifting. Users can add exercises to their own workout while also tracking the weight and how many sets and reps they did. This allows users to visualize their progress on their history page, allowing them to reference it to improve over time. Users have the option to post workouts and view other workouts posted by different users. These posts can be commented on. Allowing for interaction and connectivity in the Strength community.
